meanings.definition: The quality of being worthy of attention or notice.
meanings.sent1: Her remarkableness in the classroom made her stand out among her peers.
meanings.sent2: The remarkableness of the painting captured the attention of all who passed by.
meanings.sent3: The cat's remarkableness in catching mice was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The remarkableness of the sunrise painted the sky in vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The remarkableness of the waterfall left a lasting impression on all who witnessed it.

meanings.definition: The state of being exceptional or extraordinary.
meanings.sent1: The team's remarkableness in winning every game amazed their fans.
meanings.sent2: His remarkableness as a musician was recognized worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The dog's remarkableness in finding hidden treats was both surprising and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The remarkableness of the mountain peak took their breath away.
meanings.sent5: The remarkableness of her kindness touched the hearts of many.
